name: Cheryl Fleming
text: It's nothing to brag abt. .. it could be much better..

name: stanley grubbs
text: Great JOB letting us know !

name: Peggy Bonds
text: It doesn't give enough information.

name: Krystal Knox
text: Proven record for authority

name: Mike Jones
text: Great job

name: Tracy Brooks
text: Always accurate for the Florala area and sometimes you can see a plane or helicopter land or take off.

name: Cathy Holder
text: Good weather

name: Robert Farley
text: 'Best view from a barstool' award winner!! The Sand Bar is now open and is a great place to stop in for  a cold adult beverage. There is live entertainment on occasion...please call ahead to check the music lineup.

resp.text: Thanks for a superstar review. We appreciate you. Our music lineup is on our Facebook page, and we currently have shows Thursday, Friday, and Sunday, all summer.

name: Ray Frye
text: Great place to have a beer during a motorcycle ride. Located off scenic 225 in Baldwin co. Nice folks. Beautiful scenery.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your experience hope to see you again soon.

name: Rachael Landers
text: Angel Cruise is a wonderful bartender. So personable. Great environment

resp.text: We are flattered with all those stars, thank you. Angel is great just like our entire team. Go team!

name: Lisa Adams
text: Best view from a barstool! Excellent people and great happy hour prices. I'll definitely be back 😊😊😊

resp.text:
Oh, you have noticed that we have Happy Hour for EIGHT HOURS a day M-F?
Who does that? The RiverPub!
Lisa we rate you 5 Star too, thanks for the review.

name: David Faulkner
text: Nice neighborhood bar and they have my beer.  Dart board and Saturday kareoke.

resp.text: Glad we have your favorite beer. Thanks for the support. See ya at sunset.

name: RACHEAL ABSHIRE
text: Gorgeous sunset views but it was smoky inside and very slow outside. Probably won't be back unless im fishing.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our beautiful Tensaw River Sunset. Sorry that it was smokey inside. I'd like to invite you to comeback in the spring/summer for another shot at earning your approval at The SandBar.  We were voted Best Bushwacker by Baldwin's Best in 2018.

name: John Trask
text: The day time bartenders are great .

resp.text: Hey John, we are sure glad you approve, we think our bartenders are great too!

name: Crystal Clemmons
text: Great atmosphere and great service. They have live music, nice selection of beer and yummy pizza! My husband and I had a really great time!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your experience at Lagniappe’s “Best Bar in Baldwin County” 2019. Try to stop in on Tuesday night for our  Pass the Guitar & tacos. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Charles Bryant
text: Friendly staff, tolerant of drunken idiocy (within reason)

resp.text: Sometimes it be like that.

name: Vito Delorto
text: Just a great place.

name: Susan Wells
text: Nice laid back atmosphere with a beautiful view, great music and attentive staff.

resp.text: Glad you were able to appreciate our "Best View From a Barstool" Hope to see you again soon.

name: Jason Yu
text: Lovely

name: Blake Brown
text: Great place to kill time. Has potential to fill up fast on the weekends.

resp.text: Come-by to kill-time again soon.

name: Maxwell Lawson
text: Just good place to go and relax and have few beers i will be going back

resp.text: Hey, we appreciate you! Hope to see you again soon. #bestviewfromabarstool

name: Connie Anderson
text: Decent music good drinks good people

resp.text: If you are a music fan, come check our our Pass the Guitar on Taco Tuesday. We get started around 7. Thanks for supporting locAL business!

name: MJ Latham
text: So much fun!!! Relaxing and great to hang out or drink a beer with friends

resp.text:
MJ, if only there was an awesome place to throw a fabulous birthday party nearby, haha.
Thanks for the stars, we think you are Five-Star too.

name: Barefoot Mike and Nelly The Irish Wolfhound
text:
As stated previously, Google Maps is a little off on this one. Bar is by the water.
Friendly local spot. Live music is offered by local and out of state talent. Fun place to visit.

resp.text: Hey Barefoot, thanks for the review, glad you were able to experience our "Best View From a Barstool".

name: Fred Applegate
text: Want to thank ya'll for helping the combat vets dice run

resp.text: We love our Veterans & enjoy hosting the run annually. ♥️🇺🇸

name: Rhonda Watts
text: I don't go here and when I have it's been way to crowed and fights break out

resp.text:
Rhonda, sorry you were less than satisfied with your RiverPub experience. We do get busy at times and on rare occasions alcohol equals drama. We have a ZERO TOLERANCE Policy with anyone being rowdy or disrespectful. I hope that you will visit us again and we are able to prove we are "Chill Establishment". Regardless, we appreciate your supporting other locAL businesses.
Respectfully,
The RiverPub

name: Jeremy Crane
text: It definitely has the best view around.  Friendly environment and very reasonable on prices.

resp.text: Jeremy, Did you know our Happy Hour is so Happy it lasts 8 hours? Thanks for the review, glad you had a great experience at the "Home of the Half-Mile Smile".

name: Adam Goodman
text: Good people that run the place and awesome view of river

resp.text: What a nice compliment, we sure do love our RiverPub Crew. Glad you do too.

name: Glen White
text: Looks great 👍,they weren't open 😣

resp.text: Oh no Glen, I am sorry we weren't open when you stopped by. We are open 364 days a year at 11am and Christmas Day at 3pm. Thanks for the review. Hope to see you soon.

name: Louie Willie
text: Nice little bar. Cheap drinks!! Had a blast!! Will return!!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our cheapness, haha. We have a Happy Hour that just won't quit, 8 full Happy Hours. Thanks for the great review. See ya soon.

name: markus faulk
text: Cozy place and a nice view of the river! !

resp.text: Glad you were able to take in the beauty of our beloved Tensaw River through our picture windows.

name: Penny Rauhuff
text: Great fun

resp.text: We appreciate you Penny. Thanks for all the gold stars.

name: john plemons
text: Great atmosphere, kind people.. Great view ofthe river.

resp.text: John, did you know that we are located on the widest a stretch (1/2 mile) of the Tensaw River?  Glad you enjoyed the RiverPub, Home of the Half-Mile Smile.

name: Joe Key
text: Great view great atmosphere cold beer.

resp.text: Did you know, Joe, that we are located on the widest stretch (1/2 mile) of the Tensaw River? Thanks for the stars.

name: Windy Hale
text: Well I'm giving two stars for it's cool there's volleyball activities. Food is lousy, place is filthy..look at the walls & ceiling.

resp.text:
Sorry that you didn’t enjoy your experience, though I am unsure you were at The RiverPub at Cliff’s Landing.
Our Baldwin County Department of Health score is 100 and publicly posted. Also, the only food we serve are “frozen” pizza, burgers, and assorted chips. We are a drinking establishment not a restaurant. We open our SandBar each spring & have a tiki bar and “beach sand.” We don’t have a volleyball court, Tropics (located about 15 minutes south of us) on the Causeway does. I fear you may have confused our businesses.
Respectfully,
The RiverPub at Cliff’s Landing

name: Gregory Sims
text: Had a blast all weekend  long

resp.text: Glad to hear it Mr. Sims.

name: Denise Clark
text: So peaceful to sit in the window and watch the river go by.

resp.text: Our favorite pastime is watching the river flow. Thanks for the five-star review of The RiverPub - Home of the Half-Mile Smile.

name: susan peacock
text: Luv this place!!!

resp.text: Susan, You are definitely "in the know" thanks for your support. You da best!

name: Amy Bingham
text: Nice place,  great view of the river

resp.text: We are located at the widest point of the beautiful Tensaw River. Home of the Half-Mile Smile.

name: Tiffany Head
text: Great view overlooking the river!

resp.text: Tiffany, did you know that we are located at the widest point (1/2 mile) of the Tensaw River? Thanks for supporting locAL businesses.

name: Debbie Irwin
text: Had an awesome time

resp.text: Debbie, we are so glad you enjoyed our place, thanks for the 5 stars.

name: Catherine Crosby
text: Best damn view EVER!

resp.text:
Yes, yes, yes! When ya know, ya know.
Thanks for supporting locAL and your 5-stars. You rock.

name: Brian Logan
text: Great place with great views

resp.text: Glad you found the "Best View From a Barstool" to be a 5-Star experience. Thanks for supporting small businesses.

name: Gary Barnett
text: The best people the best view

resp.text: We sure do love our RiverPub Crew and customer family. Thanks for the stars Gary.

name: Bubbi Treefellow
text: Funny people

resp.text: Thanks for the five-stars and for your locAL support.

name: Sexy Bit420
text: Beautiful scenery

resp.text: We sure do love our Tensaw River view, thanks for the review.

name: Vincent Hambaugh
text: Relaxing environment

resp.text: We know how to chill. We are glad you enjoyed your experience, thanks for the five-star rating.

name: Michael Carroll
text: Best view you will get from a bar stool

resp.text: Thanks so much for the five-stars Michael, we appreciate your support of locAL business.

name: Jeremiah Hollowell
text: Awesome place.

resp.text: Why thank you Jeremiah, we appreciate your locAL support.

name: spirit g
text: Google is screwed up,  the bar is actually on the boat ramp.  Friendly hole in the wall.  One of only a couple places in the county that can sell alcohol on a Sunday

resp.text: Spirit, glad you found us anyway. We have often been called Baldwin County's Best Kept Secret. Welcome to the club.

name: David Wright
text: Great Music and friendly people

resp.text: Have you checked out of Tuesday night Pass the Guitar with Paul Shuler and Friends? Its an open mic night that offers a diverse sampling of the locAL talent. Everyone is welcome, and we have tacos.
